Title: Xian Yue Meng Ying
Description: ['An OVA currently in production, planned to be released on DVD in China. On August 28, 2010, a promotional video was released advertising the project. In April 2015, the script was announced as complete, and the early stages of animation had begun.']
Related: ['Parent story: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru. Kan']
